forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 5pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. West southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn approaches Downtown San Francisco, the cool air carries with it a whisper of the ocean’s embrace, teasing the possibility of rain with just a hint of moisture lingering in the atmosphere. The city’s iconic skyline, often draped in the delicate shroud of fog, remains somewhat clear at this hour, although shadows of the marine layer inch towards the horizon. Expect a slightly brisk start today, with temperatures around 48 degrees inviting a cozy jacket—a gentle barrier against the morning chill. 

As the sun makes its leisurely ascent, the day promises a gentle evolution from the overcast to a mostly sunny disposition, reaching highs of about 58. The cool, west-southwest breeze will be a steady companion, whisking away any heaviness from the air and lending a refreshing touch. Dress in layers that can adapt to the day’s transformations, perhaps a light sweater paired with a sturdy scarf. Engage in mundane yet soothing activities such as a stroll along the waterfront, where the gentle kiss of the waves and the stretch of the bay practice their quiet allure. As the city awakens, consider wandering into your favorite café, savoring the aroma of freshly brewed coffee while viewing the day unfold from within the warm embrace of your spot by the window.
